meanings.definition: A plant of the plantain family, especially the seeds of the plantago ovata plant, used as a dietary fiber supplement.
meanings.sent1: Psyllium is a type of plant that helps with digestion.
meanings.sent2: I take psyllium every morning to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The psyllium plant must be very popular with the digestive system!
meanings.sent4: Her stomach felt like a garden of psyllium seeds after the meal.
meanings.sent5: The psyllium plant is like a broom for your insides, sweeping away waste.

meanings.definition: A dietary supplement made from the husks of the seeds of the plantago ovata plant.
meanings.sent1: Psyllium supplement is good for your health.
meanings.sent2: My doctor recommended psyllium for better digestion.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled psyllium all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of psyllium was a lifesaver for her gut.
meanings.sent5: The psyllium supplement is like a shield protecting your stomach from harm.
